p: The two pandemic human retroviruses, HIV and HTLV, were originated as zoonoses in Africa at very distinct times. HTLV is an ancient virus while HIV emerged in the early 20th century [33]â€“ [34]. The present study characterized the HTLV-1 strains in blood donors and HTLV/HIV co-infected individuals from Maputo city, Mozambique, as well as, determined the genetic background of those individuals.
